---
title: "News"
listing:
  contents: posts        # This tells it to look in the /posts folder
  sort: "date desc"      # Newest posts appear first
  type: grid             # 'grid' looks much cleaner and less 'messy' than a list
  categories: true       # Adds the filter tags on the right
  image-height: 200px    # Keeps all your thumbnails the same size
